author: jwasinger
content:
Hey all, I took the liberty to update EIP 6690 based on the draft spec I posted over a month ago:  https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6690 .  I added a provisional cost model based on the implementation in Geth and pricing against the performance of the ecrecover precompile on my M2 macbook pro.

  The full Geth implementation is here:  https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/30840 .

I think that this is a good base to start implementing various crypto operations as EVM contracts using EVMMAX.

author: jwasinger
content: There are no state tests for this yet.  But the arithmetic library I wrote has a test and benchmark suite.

author: jwasinger
content: I should also note that the current implementation of 6690 exists standalone from EOF.   EOF has not yet been fully merged in the Geth codebase.
